verses.verse: <WG3796> Now Late <WG1161> On Sabbath, <WG4521> <WG3588> As It Was Getting Dusk <WG2020> Toward The <WG1519> <WG1520> Of The Week, <WG4521> Came <WG2064> Mary <WG3137> The <WG3588> Magdalene <WG3094> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Other <WG243> Mary <WG3137> To See <WG2334> The <WG3588> Sepulchre. <WG5028>

And <WG2532> , Behold, <WG2400> A Earthquake <WG4578> There Was <WG1096> Great; <WG3173> <WG32> For An Angel Of The <WG1063> Lord <WG2962> Having Descended <WG2597> Out Of <WG1537> Heaven, <WG3772> Having Come <WG4334> Rolled Away <WG617> The <WG3588> Stone <WG3037> From <WG575> The <WG3588> , Door, <WG2374> And <WG2532> Was Sitting <WG2521> Upon <WG1883> It. <WG846>
<WG2258> And Was <WG1161> <WG3588> Look <WG2397> His <WG846> As <WG5613> Lightning, <WG796> And <WG2532> <WG3588> <WG1742> His Raiment <WG846> White <WG3022> As <WG5616> Snow. <WG5510>
<WG575> And From <WG1161> The <WG3588> Fear <WG5401> Of Him <WG846> Trembled <WG4579> Those <WG3588> Keeping Guard, <WG5083> And <WG2532> Became <WG1096> As <WG5616> Dead Men. <WG3498>

<WG611> But Answering <WG1161> The <WG3588> Angel <WG32> Said <WG2036> To The <WG3588> , <WG1135> Women, <WG3361> Fear Not <WG5399> Ye; <WG5210> <WG1492> For I Know <WG1063> That <WG3754> Jesus <WG2424> Who <WG3588> Has Been Crucified <WG4717> Ye Seek. <WG2212>

<WG3756> He Is Not <WG2076> Here, <WG5602> <WG1453> For He Is Risen, <WG1063> As <WG2531> He Said. <WG2036> Come <WG1205> See <WG1492> The <WG3588> Place <WG5117> Where <WG3699> Was Lying <WG2749> The <WG3588> Lord. <WG2962>

And <WG2532> Quickly <WG5035> Going <WG4198> Say <WG2036> <WG3588> <WG3101> To His Disciples, <WG846> That <WG3754> He Is Risen <WG1453> From <WG575> The <WG3588> Dead; <WG3498> And <WG2532> , Behold, <WG2400> He Goes Before <WG4254> You <WG5209> Into <WG1519> <WG3588> Galilee; <WG1056> There <WG1563> Him <WG846> Ye Shall See. <WG3700> , Lo, <WG2400> I Have Told <WG2036> You. <WG5213>

And <WG2532> Having Gone Out <WG1831> Quickly <WG5035> From <WG575> The <WG3588> Tomb <WG3419> With <WG3326> Fear <WG5401> And <WG2532> Joy <WG5479> Great, <WG3173> They Ran <WG5143> To Tell It <WG518> <WG3588> <WG3101> To His Disciples. <WG846>

<WG5613> But As <WG1161> They Were Going <WG4198> To Tell It <WG518> <WG3588> <WG3101> To His Disciples, <WG846> Also <WG2532> , Behold, <WG2400> <WG3588> Jesus <WG2424> Met <WG528> Them, <WG846> , Saying, <WG3004> Hail! <WG5463> <WG3588> And They <WG1161> Having Come To Him <WG4334> Seized Hold Of <WG2902> , His <WG846> <WG3588> Feet, <WG4228> And <WG2532> Worshipped <WG4352> Him. <WG846>

Then <WG5119> Says <WG3004> To Them <WG846> <WG3588> <WG2424> Jesus, <WG3361> Fear Not : <WG5399> Go, <WG5217> Tell <WG518> <WG3588> <WG80> My Brethren <WG3450> That <WG2443> They Go <WG565> Into <WG1519> <WG3588> Galilee, <WG1056> And There <WG2546> Me <WG3165> Shall They See. <WG3700>

<WG4198> And As They Were Going <WG1161> They, <WG846> , Lo, <WG2400> Some <WG5100> Of The <WG3588> Guard <WG2892> Having Gone <WG2064> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> City <WG4172> Reported <WG518> To The <WG3588> Chief Priests <WG749> All Things <WG537> That <WG3588> Were Done. <WG1096>

And <WG2532> Having Been Gathered Together <WG4863> With <WG3326> The <WG3588> Elders, <WG4245> <WG4824> And Counsel <WG5037> Having Taken, <WG2983> Money <WG694> Much <WG2425> They Gave <WG1325> To The <WG3588> Soldiers, <WG4757>
Saying, <WG3004> Say <WG2036> That <WG3754> <WG3588> <WG3101> His Disciples <WG846> By Night <WG3571> Having Come <WG2064> Stole <WG2813> Him, <WG846> We <WG2257> Being Asleep. <WG2837>

And <WG2532> If <WG1437> Be Heard <WG191> This <WG5124> By <WG1909> The <WG3588> Governor, <WG2232> We <WG2249> Will Persuade <WG3982> Him <WG846> And <WG2532> You <WG5209> Free From Care <WG275> Will Make. <WG4160>

<WG3588> And They <WG1161> Having Taken <WG2983> The <WG3588> Money <WG694> Did <WG4160> As <WG5613> . They Were Taught. <WG1321> And <WG2532> Is Spread Abroad <WG1310> <WG3588> Report <WG3056> This <WG3778> Among The <WG3844> Jews <WG2453> Until <WG3360> The <WG3588> Present. <WG4594>

<WG3588> But The <WG1161> Eleven <WG1733> Disciples <WG3101> Went <WG4198> Into <WG1519> <WG3588> Galilee, <WG1056> To <WG1519> The <WG3588> Mountain <WG3735> Whither <WG3757> Appointed <WG5021> Them <WG846> <WG3588> Jesus. <WG2424>
And <WG2532> Seeing <WG1492> Him <WG846> They Worshipped <WG4352> Him : <WG846> <WG3588> But Some <WG1161> Doubted. <WG1365>

And <WG2532> Having Come To Them <WG4334> <WG3588> Jesus <WG2424> Spoke <WG2980> To Them, <WG846> , Saying, <WG3004> Has Been Given <WG1325> To Me <WG3427> All <WG3956> Authority <WG1849> In <WG1722> Heaven <WG3772> And <WG2532> On <WG1909> Earth. <WG1093>

Going <WG4198> Therefore <WG3767> Disciple <WG3100> All <WG3956> The <WG3588> Nations, <WG1484> Baptizing <WG907> Them <WG846> To <WG1519> The <WG3588> Name <WG3686> Of The <WG3588> Father <WG3962> And <WG2532> Of The <WG3588> Son <WG5207> And <WG2532> Of The <WG3588> Holy <WG40> Spirit; <WG4151>

Teaching <WG1321> Them <WG846> To Observe <WG5083> All Things <WG3956> Whatsoever <WG3745> I Commanded <WG1781> You. <WG5213> And <WG2532> , Lo, <WG2400> I 1473 P-1NS ' With 3326 PREP You 5216 P-2GP Am 1510 V-PXI-1S All 3956 A-APF The 3588 T-APF Days 2250 N-APF Until 2193 CONJ The 3588 T-GSF Completion 4930 N-GSF Of The 3588 T-GSM Age. 165 N-GSM Amen. 281 HEB
